alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 10:25PM EST until January 03 at 11:26PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Eton affecting Whitfield and Murray Counties. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Eton. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands...pasture and fields begins along the river...upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 286 or Dawnville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 12.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.3 feet on 03/18/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
